title: Correlation between equol production and intestinal microbiota after treatment with isoflavone, isoflavone plus probiotic and hormonal therapy in postmenopausal women: a pilot study.
abstract: To correlate the urinary excretion of equol with intestinal microbiota in response to isoflavone supplementation alone or in combination with probiotics, and to compare these results with those of hormone therapy in postmenopausal women.
